snippet.title: Alchemist: The Potion Monger - Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Become the Alchemist not only in your Lab!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2094370/Alchemist_The_Potion_Monger
⚗️⚗️⚗️
Open the door of your home, explore, gather ingredients, and sell or USE THE POTIONS YOU CRAFT!
⚗️⚗️⚗️
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/XSvDn5e3Zp 
⚗️⚗️⚗️
Design your home and grow plants in the backyard. Be good, bad, or neutral, and write your own alchemical tale!

More coming soon, stay tuned...
🧪💥
